Articles.Content: Floor 510: Adolescents rocking out to Metallica in a unkempt, warehouse like space. Pyrotechnics are everywhere.

Floor 511 : nitroglycerin stockyard, better hurry up, with the rock band downstares

(*see the steanley parable refference, look like a good game...)

Edited October 21, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse
Floor 512: An elevator! With no buttons anywhere. Upon closer inspection, you see it's just a really big filing cabinet.
Floor 513: AYou forget what floor you are on for a brief moment, however the useful sign at the other end of the room tells you, it's room 513.
Floor 514: The room contains a hard-to-see black spaceship.
Floor 515 : where all the lost socks goes
Floor 516: A room of 2 centimeter tall gremlins, The walls are surrounded by portals to people's pockets. A big sign says: "Headphones tangled: 1,437,043"
Floor 517: A room with a live feed of Squadcast playing.
Floor 518: Large Hadron Collider II
Floor 519 : a mini black hole is sucking the air, better hurry to the next floor
Floor 520: It's a good thing the entire room is made of lead, the intense radiation from the black hole will probably only kill you slowly now, instead of vaporizing you.
Floor 521: The Kraken is destroying the floor, you should leave before it finds you.
Floor 522: A room with a floor about a meter thick that's made of several sheets of graphene. Several scientists with big machines are walking about, looking more important than they probably are.
Floor 523 : Mind control facility
Floor 524: A single lamp flickers on and off in an otherwise bare and dark room.
Floor 525: The walls are bleeding and there is a single cupcake in the middle of the floor with a dagger through the middle!!!! (It's close to Halloween. Thought I'd add some mood.)
Floor 526 : A SPC-173, a weeping angel and a ender man have a staring contest
Floor 526: Rockomax Conglomerate's former offices. A few jackets, umbrellas, and "corporate employee compliance devices" hang off the wall.
Floor 527: your in the hall of the Emprian Space Agency control room.
Floor 528: You see the coveted HL3
Floor 529 : New Lunar Republic HQ with propaganda poster all over the wall
Floor 530 : a room filled with 530's
Floor 531: Nothing special, except a connection to the Floor 177 which make you think "Half-Life 3 confirmed".
Floor 532: Taviero's Pizza Delivery Service. May I take your order?
Floor 533: The holding area for the Ark of the Covenant.
